00075 const MemberType & MemberType::operator=(const MemberType & otherMember)
00076 {
00077         // Avoid self-assignment
00078         if (this != &otherMember)
00079         {
00080                 Copy(otherMember);
00081         }
00082         return *this; // The value of the object that was just assigned.
00083 }

00097 bool MemberType::operator==(const MemberType & otherMember) const
00098 {
00099         // Checking against self ?
00100         // This is an address comparison (i think)  OTHERWISE it will be infinite recursion.  AAA!
00101         if (this != &otherMember)
00102         {
00103 
00104 
00105                 // This MemberType
00106                 string myFirstName              = "none";
00107                 string myLastName               = "none";
00108                 long myUserId                   = 0;
00109                 string myAuthorityLevel = "patron";
00110 
00111                 getFirstName    (myFirstName);
00112                 getLastName             (myLastName);
00113                 getUserId               (myUserId);
00114                 getAuthority    (myAuthorityLevel);
00115 
00116 
00117 
00118                 // Other MemberType
00119                 string otherFirstName           = "none";
00120                 string otherLastName            = "none";
00121                 long otherUserId                        = 0;
00122                 string otherAuthorityLevel      = "patron";
00123 
00124                 otherMember.getFirstName        (otherFirstName);
00125                 otherMember.getLastName         (otherLastName);
00126                 otherMember.getUserId           (otherUserId);
00127                 otherMember.getAuthority        (otherAuthorityLevel);
00128 
00129 
00130                 // Equality comparison happens here.
00132                 if      (
00133                         myFirstName                     == otherFirstName               &&
00134                         myLastName                      == otherLastName                &&
00135                         myUserId                        == otherUserId                  &&
00136                         myAuthorityLevel        == otherAuthorityLevel
00137                         )
00138                 {
00139                         return true;    // Everything matches exactly. Equal.
00140                 }
00141                 return false;           // Members do not match exactly.  Inequal.
00142         }
00143         else
00144         {
00145                 return true; // this == this.  So they are equal.
00146         }
00147 }

00285 void MemberType::Reset()
00286 {
00287         firstName               = "none";
00288         lastName                = "none";
00289         userId                  = 0;            // User cannot use the system
00290         authorityLevel  = "patron";
00291 }

00304 void MemberType::Copy(const MemberType & otherMember)
00305 {
00306 
00307         // Other MemberType
00308         string otherFirstName           = "none";
00309         string otherLastName            = "none";
00310         long otherUserId                        = 0;
00311         string otherAuthorityLevel      = "patron";
00312 
00313         // Get properties of other member
00314         otherMember.getFirstName        (otherFirstName);
00315         otherMember.getLastName         (otherLastName);
00316         otherMember.getUserId           (otherUserId);
00317         otherMember.getAuthority        (otherAuthorityLevel);
00318 
00319         // Set my properties
00320         setFirstName    (otherFirstName);
00321         setLastName             (otherLastName);
00322         setUserId               (otherUserId);
00323         setAuthority    (otherAuthorityLevel);
00324 }
